Reentrancy in BreakerBox.tryResetBreaker(address,address) (contracts/oracles/BreakerBox.sol#341-359):
	External calls:
	- breaker.shouldReset(rateFeedID) (contracts/oracles/BreakerBox.sol#348)
	State variables written after the call(s):
